item.title: How to set mac
item.description: I’m using macbook and mac-mini. To remember what setting I used, I write some my default setting. No migration. Only Apple ID login. 0. Initial setting. Language : English Location : Korea No Migration Assistant Connect wifi and login with apple ID 1. Trackpad Silent clicking : on Tap to click : on 2. Dock Position : Left Delete all items (Remove from Dock) Turn Hiding Off 3. iCloud Nothing.
